message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
